net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds the information of everything on the map. Such things include: Actors, chunks, and location.
    Since:
    Feb 22, 2013 at 4:23:10 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    Feb 22, 2013 at 4:23:10 AM, v0.1
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

                    int ry)
        Generate a chunk at the specified location.
        Parameters:

        ry - The relative vertical location of the Chunk to generate.

      • generateChunk

        public boolean generateChunk(int rx,
                    int ry,
                    java.lang.Thread hook)
        Generate a chunk at the specified location and perform the hook after the generation of the Chunk has finished.
        Parameters:
        rx - The relative horizontal location of the Chunk to generate.
        ry - The relative vertical location of the Chunk to generate.
        hook - The generation hook to perform after the Chunk is generated.

      • generateChunksAround

        Method that generates any Chunks around the proximity of the specified Actor.
        Parameters:
        actor - The Actor to generate the Chunks around.
        Returns:
        Whether any Chunks were generated.

        Tell whether there is a Chunk already located at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        rx - The relative horizontal location of the location to check.
        ry - The relative vertical location of the location to check.
        Returns:
        Whether there is a Chunk at the location or not.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(Chunk chunk,
           int x,
           int y,
           int layer)
        Get the Tile located in the Map relative to the Chunk and location given.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The Chunk to search relative to.
        x - The horizontal location to search relative to.
        y - The vertical location to search relative to.
        Returns:
        The Tile at the location.

      • addTile

        public boolean addTile(Tile tile,
              int x,
              int y,
              int layer,
              boolean replace)
        Adds a Tile from the Chunk at the specified location. Still needs an update() call afterwards.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to add to the queue.
        x - The horizontal location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        y - The vertical location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        Returns:
        Whether a Tile was successfully added or not.

      • removeTile

        public boolean removeTile(int x,
                 int y,
                 int layer)
        Removes a Tile from the Chunk at the specified location. Still needs an update() call afterwards.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location of the Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        y - The vertical location of the Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        Returns:
        Whether a Tile was successfully removed or not.

      • updateChunkAt

        public void updateChunkAt(int x,
                 int y)
        Updates the buffers of the Chunk at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        x - The absolute Tile horizontal location.
        y - The absolute Tile vertical location.
